long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Krista Web Automation Extension automates and orchestrates processes for all the systems that may or may not have standard automation framework and well-defined APIs.

Krista Web Automation Extension integrates with the external systems for web automation and for recording of user actions on web pages. You can securely store the captured inputs. You can export the record as a JSON file to the source invoker/extension from the external systems. For every record, the extension creates a unique catalog request.
